sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"符合，一致"之意。
means: agree ：侧重指经过比较后的所有主要部分均和谐一致，无冲突和矛盾。
accord ：着重指性格、精神、语气或质量等方面的完全一致。
coincide ：多用于指观点、判断、愿望、利益或兴趣的一致或相符。偶尔用于人，强调意见或观点完全相同。
conform ：强调在形状、性格以及主要特点等方面的相似或一致。
correspond ：指在进行比较时，两个事物在某一个重要方面或细节上互相匹配、一致。

sentence.Network_en: Her expression is concerned but her body-language does not correspond.
sentence.Network_cn: 她满脸关切之情，但她的肢体语言并非如此。

sentence.Network_en: Your account of events does not correspond with hers.
sentence.Network_cn: 你对事情的陈述与她说的不相符。

sentence.Network_en: The translation does not quite correspond to the original.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French correspondre, from medieval Latin correspondere, from cor- 'together' + Latin respondere (see respond)

entry.def: If one thing corresponds to another, there is a close similarity or connection between them. You can also say that two things correspond .

example.ex: Racegoers will be given a number which will correspond to a horse running in a race...
example.tran: 观看赛马比赛的观众将获得一个与某一匹赛马相对应的号码。

example.ex: A 22 per cent increase in car travel corresponds with a 19 per cent drop in cycle mileage per person...
example.tran: 乘车出行者的比率上升了22%，与之相对应，人均骑自行车的行驶里程下降了19%。

entry.def: If you correspond with someone, you write letters to them. You can also say that two people correspond .

example.ex: She still corresponds with American friends she met in Majorca nine years ago...
example.tran: 她仍与9年前在马略卡岛结识的美国朋友们通信。

means.word_mean: 1. be compatible, similar or consistent; coincide in their characteristics;

sentences.sentence: "The two stories don't agree in many details"
"The handwriting checks with the signature on the check"
"The suspect's fingerprints don't match those on the gun"

means.word_mean: 2. be equivalent or parallel, in mathematics

sentences.sentence: "My Russian pen pal and I have been corresponding for several years"

means.word_mean: 4. take the place of or be parallel or equivalent to;

sentences.sentence: "Because of the sound changes in the course of history, an 'h' in Greek stands for an 's' in Latin"

auth_sentence.res_content: The address must correspond with the electoral register.

auth_sentence.content: I guarantee you he will correspond with you.
auth_sentence.res_content: I guarantee you he will correspond with you.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I guarantee you he will correspond with you.

stems_affixes.word_buile: despond[v.失望]+ent……的→adj.失望的,意气消沉的
spont=spond承诺,允诺+aneous……的→自内心的承诺

stems_affixes.value_cn: 通信,信件;[with]符合;[to]相当于,对应
stems_affixes.word_buile: correspond[v.通信;符合]+ence表名词→n.通信,信件;[with]符合;[to]相当于,对应

stems_affixes.value_cn: 被告;回答者;反应; 反射
stems_affixes.word_buile: respond[v.回答,响应,作出反应]+ent……的→回答的人→被告
respond[[v.回答,响应,作出反应]]省鷑.回答,响应,反应
cor共同+respond反应→共同反应→相互通信
de去掉+spond承诺,允诺→不再承诺→失望
re回+spond承诺,允诺→承诺回去→回答

sentences.en: The two sisters correspond every week.

jushi.english: The two sisters correspond every week.
